author: The Mercury
title: Ground News - Controversy explodes in fiery MCG scenes
text:
Summary by The Mercury Australia have survived a scare to defeat Pakistan by 79 runs in the Boxing Day Test and take an unassailable 2-0 lead in the series to retain the Benaud-Qadir Trophy. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
The Mercury Media Conglomerate: Murdoch Family Controversy explodes in fiery MCG scenes Australia have survived a scare to defeat Pakistan by 79 runs in the Boxing Day Test and take an unassailable 2-0 lead in the series to retain the Benaud-Qadir Trophy.
